instructions.da: Foretag et svagt højresving mod Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a slight right towards Destination 1
instructions.es: Sigue levemente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Gira ligeramente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Lakukan agak ke kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Fai una destra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.pl: Łagodnie w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Siga suave à direita sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Siga ligeiramente à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde hafif sağ yöne dön
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно праворуч в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Quẹo phải nghiêng về hướng Destination 1
